sample_sms.sms: Your A/c XX1234 debited for Rs.5,000.00 on 15-Jan-24 at POS 423156XXXXXX9876 at AMAZON RETAIL. Avl Bal: Rs.45,230.50. Not you? Call 18002586161
sample_sms.regex_pattern: Your A/c (?<account>\w+) debited for Rs\.(?<amount>[\d,]+\.?\d*) on (?<date>[\d-A-Za-z]+).*?at (?<merchant>[A-Z\s]+)\. Avl Bal: Rs\.(?<balance>[\d,]+\.?\d*)
